tgt_original: 大慧善不善者。 謂八識。

src_original: yaduta tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito mano manovijñānaṃ ca pañca ca vijñānakāyāstīrthyānuvarṇitāḥ /
tgt_original: 謂如來藏名識藏。 心意意識及五識身。

src_original: kṣaṇikaṃ punarmahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ tathāgatagarbhasaṃśabditaṃ manaḥsahitaṃ pravṛttivijñānavāsanābhiḥ kṣaṇikamanāsravavāsanābhirakṣaṇikam /  na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante kṣaṇikavādābhiniviṣṭā kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatāmimāṃ sarvadharmāṇām /  tadanavabodhāducchedadṛṣṭyā asaṃskṛtānapi dharmānnāśayiṣyanti /  (Vaidya 96) asaṃsāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā ananubhūtasukhaduḥkhā anirvāṇahetavaḥ /  tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarmahāmate anubhūtasukhaduḥkhahetusahitaḥ
